message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $12,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $11,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $13,000. This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $12,500. I think this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair compromise, and I'm sure you'll agree it's a great deal for both of us.  Let's close this deal!
I'm starting to think that we're getting a bit far apart, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $12,750, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. I really need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,750 just isn't going to work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time at $13,250. This is my final offer.  If we can't agree, I'll have to explore other options. What do you say?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $12,750. I've already stretched my budget to its limits, and I really need to stick to it. I'm starting to think that buying from John might be my best option.
